extendedInfo.description: ** THIS IS NOT A GAME, ONLY INSTALL IF YOU HAVE A COPY OF FIFA 12 FOR EITHER XBOX360, PS3 OR PC **FIFA 12 Tracker is a tool which makes it possible to track you and your friends results, statistics and standings for ranked online matches in the excellent game FIFA 12 from Electronic Arts. This app is also available for IPhone and WP7. Tell your friends!If you like this, please support further development by donating. You can do so by getting the FIFA 12 Tracker donate/unlocker. Please note that we've changed the point system to make it quicker. It will not be similar to EAs point system but still should reflect the players strength quite good. * Recent match list with team logos.* Leaderboard for you and your friends, who is the best?* Detailed statistics for each player.* Compare your own statistics against other players. * What is the current form (last 10 matches) for a player?* Notifications - Get notified when your friends have played * Share results and more on Twitter, Facebook, SMS and more...The ads in the app can be removed by buying the donate/unlocker for FIFA 12 Tracker. Please note that we're not affiliated with EA in any way. This is a game made by a FIFA 12 freak for other FIFA 12 freaks.Also notice that EA doesn't provide a stable API to get matches and statistics. Therefore FIFA 12 Tracker might not work properly if something changes at the EA servers. In that case please be patient while we try to catch up with the changes.Legal Disclaimer: This app is not an official app or connected to the gameâs developer or publisher. All in-game descriptions, logos, characters, locations and imagery are copyright to their respective owners, and usage for this game guide falls within fair use guidelines and/or in accordance with the lisence which they were released.Explanation of required permissions:* INTERNET *Needed to be able to download latest FIFA 12 data.* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE *Used for caching of avatars and team logos.* ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE *Needed to be able to check whether internet is avaiable or not.* READ_PHONE_STATE * Required by the MobClix advertisement API to work.The following teams are supported:Arsenal	Aston Villa	Blackburn Rovers	Bolton Wanderers	Chelsea	Everton	Leeds United	Liverpool	Manchester City	Manchester United	Middlesbrough	Newcastle United	Nottingham Forest	Queens Park Rangers	Southampton	Tottenham Hotspur	West Ham United	Bayern MÃ¼nchen	Borussia Dortmund	Borussia M'gladbach	SC Freiburg	Hansa Rostock	Hamburger SV	1. reviews.title: thumbs up
reviews.comment: great app. simple and intuitive. could be a pain-not sure, but if there is some way to view individual game statistics for 13, I will give 5 stars

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great free app for the FIFA addict.  I just play head to head with existing teams, and it\'s a quick source to see what your opponent\'s skill level is.  Excellent job.  Keep improving.  Thanks
